sub_topic: Solving systems of linear equations with complex coefficients
message_1:
Solve the system of linear equations with complex coefficients:

2x + 3y + 4z = 7 + 5i

x - 2y + 5z = -3 + i

3x + y + 2z = 4 - 3i
message_2:
To solve the system of linear equations with complex coefficients, we can use the Gaussian elimination method. First, let's write the augmented matrix for the given system:

| 2  3  4 | 7 + 5i |
| 1 -2  5 | -3 + i |
| 3  1  2 | 4 - 3i |

Step 1: Eliminate the x-term in the second and third rows:

R2 = R2 - (1/2)R1
R3 = R3 - (3/2)R1

| 2   3    4  |  7 + 5i  |
| 0  -4  3/2 | -7 - 3i  |
| 0  -3/2 -4  | -6 - 5i  |

Step 2: Divide the second row by -4:

R2 = R2 / -4

| 2   3    4  |  7 + 5i  |
| 0   1 -3/8 |  7/4 + 3/4i  |
| 0  -3/2 -4  | -6 - 5i  |

Step 3: Eliminate the y-term in the third row:

R3 = R3 + (3/2)R2

| 2   3    4  |  7 + 5i  |
| 0   1 -3/8 |  7/4 + 3/4i  |
| 0   0 -31/4| -5 - 11/2i |

Step 4: Solve for z:

z = (-5 - 11/2i) / (-31/4)
z = (20 + 22i) / 31

Step 5: Solve for y:

y = (7/4 + 3/4i) - (-3/8)(20 + 22i) / 31
y = (7/4 + 3/4i) - (15 + 33i) / 31
y = (-1 + 4i) / 31

Step 6: Solve for x:

x = (7 + 5i - 3(-1 + 4i) / 31 - 4(20 + 22i) / 31) / 2
x = (7 + 5i + 3 - 12i - 80 - 88i) / 62
x = (-70 - 95i) / 62

So the solution to the system of linear equations is:

x = (-70 - 95i) / 62
y = (-1 + 4i) / 31
z = (20 + 22i) / 31
